channel.title: CITES Security Main Calendar
channel.description: This is the aggregate calendar for CITES Security. It will include CITES Security Training events as well as CITES Security Updates. Should CITES Security develop any further calendars, they also will feed into this main calendar.

item.title: Microsoft Operating System and Software Updates
item.description:
Microsoft regularly releases updates for all versions of Windows, Office and other Microsoft applications. Using Internet Explorer visit: http://update.microsoft.com to receive these important updates today. For more information on securing your operating system please visit:

https://security.illinois.edu/content/securing-your-computer

item.title: Computer Security Training
item.description: The Office of Privacy and Information Assurance (OPIA) is pleased to offer a Security Orientation for faculty and staff. Attendees will learn how to secure their computers, proper password management, IT security policies, how to protect sensitive University data, and how to protect their personal identity information.

item.title: Working with Sensitive Data Training
item.description: The Office of Privacy and Information Assurance (OPIA) is pleased to offer an orientation for faculty and staff that work with sensitive data. Attendees will learn about how to protect sensitive data, securely share data with other people, and how to safely store or destroy data once they are done using it.
